attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are in the throes of a very vicious recession,caused by incompetence and greed.My husband and many others have been made redundant as a direct result of this.Goodwin & Hornby and others, who are to blame for this,are rewarded  with £millions of our money.Whilst we have to subsist on £60 JSA per week.Banks charge exorbitant penalties;sentences for murder & serious crimes are a joke;prisoners are better off than pensioners;terrorists are suing us ;greedy MP's,claim for 2nd homes, relatives exorbitant salaries & expenses, even groceries! ;Child murderers get new identities & protection all at our expense.This is our money that is being squandered..enough is enough.We have a right to see where our money is going,who sanctions it and how much is being spent.We are entitled to an annual statement from the Govt detailing all of the above! It is time for honesty,accountability and transparency! We have paid into this country for over 40 years,yet all we are entitled to is £60 per week for 6 months...absolutely shocking and unacceptable !The wind of change is gathering momentum,and not before time !!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
